dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: The tenge is on an upward trend again today against the dollar.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The tenge is on an upward trend again today against the dollar.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The tenge continued its upward trend as the US dollar fell in value on Kazakhstan's currency market on April 29.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, KASE reported the average weighted rate at 512.32 tenge per dollar—that's down 1.18 from yesterday.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, K A S E reported the average weighted rate at five hundred twelve point three two tenge per dollar-that's down one point one eight from yesterday.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to results from the Kazakhstan Stock Exchange (KASE), the average weighted exchange rate of the US dollar stood at 512.32 tenge, down 1.18 tenge from the previous day.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And the National Bank's the official rate even higher, at 513.68.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the National Bank's the official rate even higher, at five hundred thirteen point six eight.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The official rate set by the National Bank for April 29 is 513.68 tenge per dollar.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: But if you're actually exchanging cash in Almaty, you'd get around 511.95 if you're selling dollars, or pay 513.87 to buy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But if you're actually exchanging cash in Almaty, you'd get around five hundred eleven point nine five if you're selling dollars, or pay five hundred thirteen point eight seven to buy.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to kurs.kz, exchange offices in Almaty are buying dollars at an average of 511.95 tenge and selling at 513.87 tenge.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And in Astana it's a bit different—uh, buying around 510, selling over 516.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And in Astana it's a bit different-uh, buying around five hundred ten, selling over five hundred sixteen.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In Astana, the average buying rate is 510.28 tenge, with the selling rate at 516.33 tenge.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: So there's some regional variation there, which is interesting.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So there's some regional variation there, which is interesting.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It really is. And you know, this isn't just a blip—earlier forecasts from economists pointed toward this strengthening.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It really is. And you know, this isn't just a blip-earlier forecasts from economists pointed toward this strengthening.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Previously, financial market experts shared their forecasts on the dollar exchange rate in Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right, they've been expecting the dollar to drop below 500 tenge at some point, haven't they?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, they've been expecting the dollar to drop below five hundred tenge at some point, haven't they?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. It feels like a combination of local monetary policy and broader global dollar weakness.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. It feels like a combination of local monetary policy and broader global dollar weakness.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For everyday people though, it might mean imports get a little cheaper, but exporters could feel the pinch.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For everyday people though, it might mean imports get a little cheaper, but exporters could feel the pinch.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. And with exchange offices offering slightly different rates, it pays to shop around.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. And with exchange offices offering slightly different rates, it pays to shop around.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. It'll be interesting to see if this trend holds through the week.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. It'll be interesting to see if this trend holds through the week.
